professionalStatement: Robotics Engineer specializing in autonomous mobile robot navigation, perception, and system integration. Experienced in developing custom planners, multi-map navigation, and LiDAR-based docking using ROS 2. Strong background in Python, embedded systems, and building reliable navigation pipelines for real-world deployment.

keyResponsibilities.description: Integrated Intel RealSense stereo camera with a Jetson Orin NX for warehouse operations, enabling Stereo SLAM and odometry tracking. Improved mapping reliability by implementing RTAB-Map for real-time 3D mapping using point cloud and RGB-D data.
Equipped a micro drone with dual EO/IR camera and dual-antenna GPS for railway inspection, ensuring stable navigation under electromagnetic interference.
Integrated and tuned an FPV drone with ArduPilot firmware, ORQA F405, Zeus VTX, and dual EO/IR cameras for autonomous flight and real-time video in search-and-rescue applications.

projects.name: Multi-Map Navigation in ROS 2 (Humble)
projects.description: Implemented multi-map navigation enabling dynamic switching between multiple maps during runtime. Managed map server, localization reset, and costmap reinitialization during map transitions. Ensured seamless navigation across environments with consistent TF and pose handling. Validated system in simulated and real indoor environments.

projects.name: LiDAR-Based Autonomous Docking Using ICP
projects.description: Implemented a marker-less autonomous docking system using LiDAR point clouds. Used ICP (Iterative Closest Point) to estimate relative pose (x, y, yaw) between robot and docking station. Integrated pose output with motion controller for closed-loop docking. Achieved accurate and repeatable docking under noise and partial occlusions.

projects.name: Custom DWA Local Planner (From Scratch)
projects.description: Implemented a Dynamic Window Approach (DWA) local planner from scratch without using Nav2 default planners. Designed trajectory sampling and cost functions for obstacle avoidance, goal alignment, and smooth motion. Integrated LaserScan / PointCloud data for real-time collision checking. Validated performance in Gazebo and real-robot tests.

projects.name: Indigenous Logistics Drone for Payload Delivery
projects.description: Worked as a UAV System Engineer, focusing on drone assembly and mechanical design. Designed a Smart and Simple Payload Carrying System for efficient weight distribution and stability. Integrated LiDAR and Camera sensors for mapping and perception, enabling autonomous navigation. Optimized drone arm positioning to improve thrust efficiency and endurance in challenging terrains. Received appreciation for a realistic, cost-effective design addressing practical challenges.
